title: I'm Lesbian: Girl To Girl Talk
description: Coming out of the closet is the process of accepting yourself as a lesbian and figuring out how open you want to be about your sexual orientation. Some donâ€™t really understand about being lesbian and it may be hard to find a listening ear that can be supportive. Some friends will accept you. Others may turn away from you or tell other people without your permission.What gets you more excited, the idea of kissing a man or kissing a woman?
author: Zoe Jasmine
